{{also|mitte}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|mitte}}, from {{inh|de|goh|mitti}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*midjǭ||centre}}, {{m|gem-pro|*midją}}.{{R:EWddS|ed=22|hw=Mitte}}, from {{m|gem-pro|*midjaz}}, ultimately from {{der|de|ine-pro|*medʰyo-}}. Cognate to {{cog|non|miðja}} and {{cog|ang|midde}}, {{m|ang|midd}} ({{cog|en|mid}}). ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈmɪ.tə/}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Mitte.ogg|Audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-Mitte.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Mitten}} # [[middle]] # [[center]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de |Dorfmitte |Erdmitte |Jahrhundertmitte |Jahresmitte |Monatsmitte |Platzmitte |Rasenmitte |Saalmitte |Satzmitte |Stadtmitte |Tagesmitte }} ====Related terms==== {{rel3|de |Mittag |Mittwoch |Mitternacht }} ===References=== ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
